src_original: ity uktvā sarvān visarjayed iti /  atha subāhuparipaṭhitagāthābhir baliṃ dadyāt /
tgt_original: atra subāhutantroktagāthābhir balikaṃ srijetāḥ| piṭakaiḥ śakatair bhārair

src_original: ye kecid bhūmau nivasanti divyāḥ //  nyastaikajānuḥ pṛthivītale 'smin //
tgt_original: ca ye ke vibhūmauni vasanti divyāḥ| 'nyastaikajānuḥ| vrithipītalehaṃ

src_original: kṛtāṃjalir vijñāpayāmi tāṃs tu //  saputradāraiḥ saha bhṛtyasaṃghaiḥ //
tgt_original: kritāñjalir vijñāpayāmi tāṃs tāna| saputradāraiḥ sahabhrityāsaṃghaiḥ|

src_original: śrutvā ihāyāntu anugrahārtham //  ye merupṛṣṭhe nivasanti bhūtāḥ //
tgt_original: śrutvā-ihāyantv anugrahārthāṃ| ye me tu priṣṭhi nivasanti bhūtāyo nandane ye ca

src_original: ye nandane ye ca surālayeṣu //  ye codayāste ravimaṇḍale ca //
tgt_original: surādayeṣu| ye codāyās taṃ girim antareṣu nāgeṣu sarveṣu ca ye vasanti| sarisu

src_original: nagareṣu sarveṣu ca ye vasanti //  saritsu sarvāsu ca saṃgameṣu //  ratnālaye cāpi kṛtādhivāsāḥ //  vāpītaṭāgeṣu ca palvaleṣu //
tgt_original: sarvāsu ca saṃgameṣu ratnālaye ca' pi kritādhvāsaḥ| vāpi taṭākeṣu ca sālpaleṣu

src_original: kūpeṣu vapreṣu ca nirjhareṣu //  grāmaghoṣeṣu surakānane vā //  śūnyālaye devagṛheṣu ye ca //  vihāracaityāvasathāśrameṣu //  maṭheṣu śālāsu ca kuñjarāṇām //
tgt_original: kūpeṣu vajreṣu ca nirjhareṣu| ye grāmaghoṣe surakānane ca śūnyālaye devagriheṣu  ye ca vihāracaityavasathāśrameṣu matheṣu śālāsu ca kuñjarānāṃ| ye bhūbhritāṃ citramriheva  santirathyāsu vīthīṣu ca catvareṣu|ye [2] caikavrikṣeṣu mahāpatheṣu

src_original: ye bhūbhṛtāṃ citragṛhe vasanti //  rathyāsu vīthīṣu ca catvareṣu //  ye caikavṛkṣeṣu mahāpatheṣu //  mahāśmaśāneṣu mahāvaneṣu //  siṃhebha ṛkṣādhyuṣiteṣu ye ca //
tgt_original: mahāśmāśāneṣu mahāvaneṣu||  siṃhe bharikṣāddhyuṣitāsu ye ca vasanti ghorāsu mahāṭavīṣu||

src_original: vadanti ghorās mahāṭavīṣu //  dvīpeṣu divyeṣu kṛtālayāś ca //  merau śmaśāne nivasanti ye ca //
tgt_original: dvīpeṣu divyeṣu  kritālayaś ca merau śmāśāneni vasanti yo ca| hriṣṭāpasannaḥ| prajāgandhamālyaṃ
